comments.raw_text: Implement Adobe's CSS Regions proposal for more complex layouts like those used in print. This is still in flux, but Adobe has created a WebKit-based prototype found here: http://labs.adobe.com/technologies/cssregions/

comments.raw_text: Visibly, “Exclusions and Shapes” ( http://dev.w3.org/csswg/css3-exclusions/ ) is also use in Adobe demo.
